prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-Dimensional Rectangular Prism with a Sloped Side The first part to construct is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a sloped side angled at 45 degrees from the top and bottom. The prism has the following dimensions: 2 units in length, 1 unit in width, and 1 unit in height. The prism is centered on a white background. 1. **Create a new coordinate system.** Set the euler angles to [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] degrees and the translation vector to [0.0, 0.0, 0.375]. 2. **Draw a 2D sketch on the X-Y plane.** This sketch will serve as the base for the prism. 3. **Create Loop 1.** This loop will form the perimeter of the base. 4. **Create Line 1.** Start at the point [0.0, 0.0] and end at the point [0.75, 0.0]. 5. **Create Line 2.** Start at the point [0.75, 0.0] and end at the point [0.75, 0.75]. 6. **Create Line 3.** Start at the point [0.75, 0.75] and end at the point [0.0, 0.75]. 7. **Create Line 4.** Start at the point [0.0, 0.75] and end at the point [0.0, 0.0]. 8. **Close Loop 1.** Since Loop 1 consists of 4 lines, the loop must be closed by having the end point of Line 4 coincide with the start point of Line 1. 9. **Scale the 2D sketch by a factor of 0.75.** This will reduce the size of the sketch to the desired dimensions. 10. **Transform the 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using euler angles and the translation vector.** Use the values provided in the coordinate_system component of the CAD assembly JSON: euler_angles of [0.0, 0.0, 0.0] and translation_vector of [0.0, 0.0, 0.375]. 11. **Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model.** The extrude depth towards the normal should be 0.1875 units and the extrude depth opposite the normal should also be 0.1875 units. The sketch scale should be 0.75. Please note the final dimensions of this part after scaling and extrusion will be approximately: 0.75 length, 0.75 width, and 0.375 height ( accounting for some deformation due to 45 degree angled side ).</description>
completion:
<json>
{"parts":{"part_1":{"coordinate_system":{"Euler Angles":[0.0,0.0,0.0],"Translation Vector":[0.0,0.0,0.375]},"sketch":{"face_1":{"loop_1":{"line_1":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.0]},"line_2":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.0],"End Point":[0.75,0.75]},"line_3":{"Start Point":[0.75,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.75]},"line_4":{"Start Point":[0.0,0.75],"End Point":[0.0,0.0]}}}},"extrusion":{"extrude_depth_towards_normal":0.1875,"extrude_depth_opposite_normal":0.1875,"sketch_scale":0.75,"operation":"NewBodyFeatureOperation"}}}}
